DESCRIPTION: Gains new effects at higher levels of Intoxication.
Ammo is spent to use certain cards.
Burned creatures take damage at the start of their turn. Each turn, Burn is halved and applies #yAfterburn to all other creatures.
Afterburned creatures take damage at the start of their turn, then Afterburn is removed.
Frozen creatures take extra Attack damage. Each turn, Freeze is halved.
When a Shocked creature is attacked, other creatures take damage. Each turn, Shock is halved.
Minerals are required to use certain cards.
Pickaxe cards are a certain class of cards.
